DOC.brief_title: Study Denufosol Tetrasodium Inhalation Solution Patients With Cystic Fibrosis ( CF ) Lung Disease
DOC.criteria: Have confirm diagnosis cystic fibrosis Have FEV1 great equal 75 % less equal 110 % predict normal age , gender height Be able reproducibly perform spirometry Be clinically stable least 4 week screen Have abnormal renal liver function Have lung transplant Unable discontinue use hypertonic saline Participated Inspire trial 08108
